title: The Sequence score system
abstract: Chapter 1 explains about the company and the structure of the company. In the Chapter 2, explains about the details of the assignment the objective of the company, and the problem that need to be solved. Chapter 3 explains the approaches to solve the problem and which techniques that the intern used. Chapter 4 explains about the details of the new application, what kinds of improvements were realized with the new application and the user interfaces of the application. Chapter 5 explains about the result that the intern produced during the internship. Chapter 6 contains the conclusion on this project and recommendation to the company. Chapter 7 contains evaluation during the intern working in the DAF and doing the project. At the end of chapter, appendixes of documents that were needed and are important during or as a result of the internship, are included. These documents are: Time Management, Project Initiation Document, Software Requirement Document and The User Manual.
